languages.text: {n}Пленник смиренно кланяется и безропотно позволяет себя увести.{/n}
{n}The prisoner offers you a bow of resignation and calmly allows the enforcers to escort him out.{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚人は観念したようにあなたに会釈し、エンフォーサーが彼を連れ出すのを静かに受け入れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner offers you a bow of resignation and calmly allows the enforcers to escort him out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人は観念したようにあなたに会釈し、エンフォーサーが彼を連れ出すのを静かに受け入れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}囚犯认命般地向你鞠了一躬，随后平静地跟着执法者走了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner offers you a bow of resignation and calmly allows the enforcers to escort him out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚犯认命般地向你鞠了一躬，随后平静地跟着执法者走了。{/n}
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}Der Gefangene verneigt sich resigniert vor dir und gestattet den Enforcers ruhig, ihn hinauszuführen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner offers you a bow of resignation and calmly allows the enforcers to escort him out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gefangene verneigt sich resigniert vor dir und gestattet den Enforcers ruhig, ihn hinauszuführen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}Le prisonnier s'incline devant vous en signe de résignation et laisse les prévôts l'escorter jusqu'à la sortie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner offers you a bow of resignation and calmly allows the enforcers to escort him out.{/n}

traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: {n}El prisionero te ofrece una reverencia con aire de resignación y se deja llevar tranquilamente por los guardias.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner offers you a bow of resignation and calmly allows the enforcers to escort him out.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mahkûm, teslim olurcasına eğilip infazcıların kendisine eşlik etmesine müsaade ediyor.{/n}
